response.answer_text: The world saraswat means related to saraswat. There are two ways to understand this word. People who decided near river saraswati.Long ago when the Vedas were lost and there was nobody to revive it, saraswati who was born as a human being in North India somewhere around the Himalayas and had learnt from her father revived it and taught Vedas again. So this system of teaching Vedas is called saraswata Patha.
